title: PATCH: ISOLatin1AccentFilterFactory
description:
Factory for a filter which removes accented characters using org.apache.lucene.analysis.ISOLatin1AccentFilter

I don't know how many factories you want to include in SOLR, feel free to ignore this - it is not very complex code anyway

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
Did you mean to attach something here?

The factories are certainly welcome.
Esp before we have a generic one that works for simple filters via reflection (and performance remains to be seen).
